page.title: 19THE JOURNEY TO PORTISHEAD
page.content: At about 9.00 we were all in the class room getting things ready like clip boards.Then at about 9.10 we were walking to the bus stop which was opposite the{Clannage,}we waited for about 20 mins but during that time the boys were being stupid and doing things like putting their hands out when cars drove past but Mr Lang told them off.Then some of the girls were waving to people who drove past but quite soon they stopped before he told them off as well.About 9.30 the bus came and we all jumped on at the same time but Paul O'shea,Bryn Herbert and Iain Eld got on first and sat at the back of the bus.Me and Vicky sat the second seat from the second door.Mr Lang got on the bus last and paid Â£21 for tickets but it was so long that he had to roll it up.Some of the boys were{idiots! }TANYA STEWART
